game.name: Rusty's Retirement
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Adjustable Text Size, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 다른 일을 하고 있을 동안 화면 하단에서 실행되어 편안하게 즐길 수 있는 방치형 농장 시뮬레이터입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A relaxing idle-farming simulator that sits at the bottom of your screen while you do other things.

reviewHighlights.text: I've always wanted a Stardew Valley-like game where I don't have to control a character. I want it automated and this is that game.
I just lost nearly 3 hours of progress. Even though the game is supposed to have an autosave feature, it failed to work, and my save file has reverted...
